definition: Xinning county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning

sentences.english: Lang Shan locates in Xinning County, Hunan Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 崀山位於中國湖南省新寧縣境內。
